Schedules the IMS PSB for database access and logs an error if the scheduling fails.
Reads the card cross-reference record using the card number and sets status flags or logs warnings/errors based on the result.
Reads the account record using the account ID from the XREF and updates status flags or logs warnings/errors if the account is not found or read fails.
Reads the customer record using the customer ID from the XREF and updates status flags or logs warnings/errors if the customer is not found or read fails.
Reads the pending authorization summary segment from IMS using the account ID from the XREF record to determine if there is existing authorization data.

Updates the authorization summary and inserts the new authorization record into the database if the card was found in XREF.
